project.name: ApprovalTests.Java
project.description: Unit testing asserts can be difficult to use. Approval tests simplify this by taking a snapshot of the results, and confirming that they have not changed.

project.name: ApprovalTests Utilities
project.description: Utility classes for ApprovalTests.Java - a snapshot-based testing library that simplifies assertions by comparing expected output to approved files.
